description: We're sure you can tell that TommyD likes to work out. Something you may not have known is he's a part time personal trainer.During this last shoot, one of our newest performers, Chad Con, wanted to be shown how to really pump iron.During their training, Tommy got a bit turned on while Chad was doing some lifting while bent over. This led to some hot making out and stripping, which of course, turned into blowjobs and some major ass fucking.After the session was all said and done, both of them agreed; it was a great workout!Enjoy!
title: The Internet Hookup
